ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 374
ygData.msgSnippet: Oasis is so crowded,  and not the best learning place to learn how to be a good enchanter for your later lvls (20 through 60, depending where you hunt from 55
ygData.messageBody:
Oasis is so crowded, and not the best learning place to learn how to be a
good enchanter for your later lvls (20 through 60, depending where you hunt
from 55 to 60). If I were you I would suggest going to Unrest behind the
house. Never hunt in front of the house too many trains. The back side of
the house is good place for your lvl and you can solo there too until you
can get a group. Learn your spells and what they actually do. You will be
one step ahead of everyone else anyways because, at least on my server,
most enchanters are power leveled up these days and that's one class if you
dont know what you are doing you cant fake it.

Mu
55 Enchanter
Tunare Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Casparian [mailto:casp@...]
Sent: Friday, June 22, 2001 5:01 AM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 374


At 11:47 22/06/01, you wrote:
>http://gucomics.everlore.com/strip/gu_06222001.jpg

hehehehe

Hi all, i've not introduced myself... just joined this list last week and
as there haven't been any posts.. well, that's my reason for not doing it
before now :o)
I've only just started playing EQ in the last few weeks, i'm a Gnome
Enchantress on The Rathe server.
Doing pretty well, I'm lvl 14 now and a large loan from a friend has
ensured that I've been able to get almost all my spells and lots of decent
kit :o)
Anyway, so far I've played... in North Freeport for the first few lvl's,
Misty Thicket up till 7 or 8, then West Commons up until now, killing
Dervs. I've pretty much stopped getting exp from killing them now (in
groups of 6 usually), so have been dumped in Oasis... but so far everything
iv'e come across is green or red :o(
Does anyone have any tips for the best place to be located at this
lvl? Obviously I'd like to get to 16 soon to get breeze but at the rate
I'm going, I'm either going to not move from low lvl 14, or go down to 13
if I get killed any more in oasis :o(
Thanks a lot,
